item.title: SQLAlchemy+SQLite3„ÅßOperationalError
item.description: # Thing you want to do I want to use SQLite3 with SQLAlchemy I want to specify the DB file with an absolute path Environment Python3.8.1 on alpine linux 3.11 on Docker What happened I wrote the following code, hoping that a DB file will be created in /var/data engine = create_engine("sqlite:///var/data/project.sqlite3") ... When I ran it, I was angry that the database file could not be opened
